subject: Softball
lead_paragraph: Natasha Watley’s run-scoring single in the seventh inning helped the United States to a 1-0 victory over China in both teams’ opener at the world softball championship in Caracas, Venezuela.
snippet: Natasha Watley’s run-scoring single in the seventh inning helped the United States to a 1-0 victory over China in both teams’ opener at the world softball championship in Caracas, Venezuela.
